review: Far better quality than having had the Chromecast....WELL WORTH IT and customizable too!!
author: Cj

review: When it can stay connected to the wifi network, the Fire TV stick works great.
author: Lindsey deMont

review: as advertised. Beware of Amazon prime "free trial".
author: ramon de santiago

review: Perfect now I can see my dodger games....👍👍👍
author: jaime

review: Works great and performs very quickly. Met my expectations.
author: Dt

review: So far so good, still learning but I like it. I watch a lot of Vevo videos and Youtube show.
author: pixmakerdave

review: I installed the Amazon fire TV stick, and it was up and running in two minutes. Its a easy product to install and use. I have Fire TV on my main television and decided to try the stick for my second. I am a Prime member and am pleased with the streaming options at these affordable prices. Other than no voice search, no real noticeable difference. Great Job!!
author: Shari

review: Is the content on this device available in my region (Trinidad). I bought a Roku in a store in Miami and the sales representative never informed me that it would not function outside of America.
author: Finemiche

review: Love it but the only problem is most of the apps don't support xfinity so I have limited access. The device is easy to use and set up love it
author: Latonia mayweather
